title: Interpretation of a dream about gifts by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about gifts A gift is a gratitude from one person to another, or it is an expression of feelings and love between them, and seeing a gift in a dream is one of the dreams for which scholars have given many different interpretations. It differs if the fortune teller gives it or takes it from someone else, and in the event that the person who gives you the gift is known first, all of this and much more will be presented in this article. Interpretation of a dream about gifts Jurists mentioned many indications in seeing gifts in a dream, the most important of which are the following: Seeing someone giving a gift to someone indicates that he is a person who has a great degree of generosity and generosity and loves people and maintains good relationships with them. Whoever notices during his sleep that he is giving his manager something special as an expression of his thanks and gratitude to him, this indicates his desire to obtain a benefit from him or a certain interest. If a person sees in a dream a gift of gold, this is a sign of high status among people, a lot of financial gains and successful work. And when a person dreams of a bottle of perfume presented as a gift to someone, this is a sign of a fragrant biography, good deeds and kind words. Do you have a dream that confuses you? Wait .. Search in Google a site for the secrets of interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about gifts by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained that the dream of gifts has many interpretations, the most prominent of which are the following: Gifts in a dream indicate love and the relationship between the dreamer and the person who gave them the gift and symbolize engagement or marriage. Whoever sees in a dream that someone gave him flowers, this is a sign of achieving goals and objectives in life. If a person dreams of receiving a gift, this indicates the good reputation he enjoys among people and the love he enjoys. If someone dreams that he sent a gift to someone, this is a great opportunity on its way to him, but he will miss it and will not take advantage of it. Seeing a book as a gift in a dream symbolizes the good news that will reach the dreamer in the very near future. And if someone dreams of a gift of chocolate, this heralds the arrival of happy events. Interpretation of a dream about gifts by Ibn Shaheen Among the most important interpretations that Sheikh Ibn Shaheen came with in interpreting the vision of gifts in a dream are the following: Receiving a gift in a dream symbolizes the love and appreciation of the person who gives it to the fortune teller and indicates the occurrence of unexpected things that cause him happiness And relieve him of the sorrows and worries he feels. If a person sees in his dream that he received many gifts, this is a sign that he is a talented person who has many skills but does not know how to benefit from them. Seeing a gift while sleeping indicates the ability to achieve goals and success, no matter how difficult things and circumstances are. When a person dreams of giving a gift to someone, this indicates the benefit that will return to him, and a wide range of livelihood and high status among people, in addition to the fact that the Lord - Almighty - will guide him and his religion. Whoever sees in a dream that someone gave him a gift that he does not like, the dream symbolizes the bad and tense relationship between them and the desire of both of them to eliminate the other. Interpretation of a dream about gifts

title: Interpretation of a dream about lupine according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lupine according to Al-Nabulsi has many benefits, as it is an important factor in losing weight. Eating lupine leads to loss of appetite for a certain period of time, and thus eating a small amount of food during the day helps a lot in losing weight and obtaining an ideal and warm body. It also helps in reducing stress, Because lupine has many positive points when you see it in a dream, it has many interpretations, most of which are good. The interpretation of seeing a lupine varies, and a lupine in a dream indicates good luck and gaining money, but after fatigue and adversity. Interpretation of a dream about a lupine by Al-Nabulsi: A green lupine in a dream shows the money that the dreamer will obtain, but after he gets tired. Seeing a dry lupine indicates pain and stress. Dreaming of a lupine and eating it Evidence of the recovery of an illness. Cooking lupine is evidence of a quick life and prosperity. Dreaming of dried lupine is evidence of some painful things in a person’s life. Lupine in a dream indicates money after fatigue and hard work. Interpretation of a dream about lupine for a manDried lupine in a man’s dream portends money. The lupine appears What a man dreams about is that he is a person who loves money very much. Eating boiled lupine in a man’s dream means that he gets money, but he spends it quickly. Therefore, distributing cooked lupine in a dream indicates the good wealth and livelihood that the person will earn. Interpretation of a dream about lupine for a single woman: Eating lupine Green in a dream indicates exhaustion. Seeing an unmarried woman eating lupine means good luck and overcoming obstacles. It also indicates that he will get a lot of money. Seeing a bitter thermos is a bad dream and indicates anxiety, distress, fatigue and tension. A dry thermos in a girl’s dream indicates unhappiness and fatigue for that girl. Wearing a thermos by a girl in a dream indicates the disappearance of tension and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a thermos for a woman Married Seeing crushed lupine with honey in a dream is a sign of the good that this woman will receive. But using crushed lupine in a married woman’s dream to clean the skin is a sign of money, a lot of good luck, and a stable life. Lupine used in cosmetics indicates stability in married life. Interpretation of a dream Lupine for a pregnant womanEating bitter lupine in a dream is a sign of the birth of a new child. Eating sweet lupine in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a girl. Lupine in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates kindness and ease of birth. Seeing lupine indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life, Also, eating lupine in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth. Lupine also indicates the health of the mother and fetus. The end of worry, worry, and fatigue. Seeing a yellow lupine means good luck and hearing good news. It also indicates happy occasions and joy for the new baby. Interpretation of a dream about a lupine for a single woman. Distributing a green lupine in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be freed from troubles and sorrows. Distributing a green lupine in a dream indicates kindness, generosity, and good intentions. It also indicates

title: Interpretation of dreams: A lion in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams Lion in a dream The fact that the lion is one of the strongest predatory animals that a person is afraid of and afraid to approach, because it is a cannibalistic animal and seeing a lion in a dream is a frightening dream that excites him. Anxiety and fear in a person’s sleep, as this vision carries many different connotations and indicators and can indicate good or evil, and all of this is done by the command of God Almighty, and today we have prepared for you our article to explain the interpretation. Among the dreams is a lion in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a lion: As for seeing a lion entering a house and a sick man died in it. Seeing a lion riding a lion in a dream is evidence that the person will get something that cannot be delayed. Escaping from a lion in a dream indicates that the person will be saved from something that must Be careful of it. If you see a lion in a dream, this indicates the presence of traitors or thieves. Seeing someone arguing with a lion in a dream means that this person is arguing with an enemy. Seeing an obedient lion in a dream is a sign of benefit or the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. Seeing A lioness in a dream is evidence of the king’s daughter. As for the dreamer who sees that he is eating the meat of a lioness, this is evidence that he has defeated a great king, and drinking from the lioness’s milk in a dream is evidence of the enemy’s victory or the loss of money. From the Sultan. Seeing a lion in the house is evidence of the dreamer’s long life. To see yourself killing a lion in a dream means freedom from worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about a lion for a single woman. Seeing a lion in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of the presence of a strong enemy. As for seeing a lion carrying a lion In an unmarried woman’s dream, this is a sign of peace with the enemy. A lion escaping in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates salvation from the enemy and victory over enemies. Fighting a lion in a dream indicates rivalry and enmity. Seeing a lion trampling in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of eliminating Problems, sorrows, and satisfying needs. When seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, there was a lion behind her, and suddenly evidence of malice from the ruler or sultan appeared. As for a lion’s kiss in a dream, it is a sign of benefit and the fulfillment of desires and ambitions. A lion’s wound in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of... Death and damage. Riding on the back of a lion in a dream is evidence of the high status of an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about a lion for a pregnant woman. A lion in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of her enemy’s desire for evil and evil. If a lion defeats a pregnant woman in a dream, this is a sign of difficult problems for the pregnant woman and a troubled birth. As for the lion not harming the pregnant woman in the dream, this indicates that childbirth for the pregnant woman will be easy and difficult, and her health is good. Interpretation of a dream about a lion chasing me: Whoever sees a lion chasing him and killing the lion during the chase, this indicates salvation from what is chasing you and escaping from enemies and sorrows. To see that a lion is chasing you, But the lion cannot control you, this is a sign of a serious chronic illness. If the lion is chasing you in the house, this is evidence of a disease affecting the people of the house. Seeing a lion chasing you in a dream is evidence that the owner of this dream will be unjust and unjust. As for seeing a lion If he chases you and hurts you, it is a sign of grief

title: Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream: There are many visions for individuals, and they have many explanations and interpretations, including seeing baked goods in a dream, which has many interpretations, although some people forget the details of the dream or that they dreamed in the first place, but the presence of people who remember the dream with all its details is good because the dream is unrelated events. Understandable to humans, it is caused by many reasons such as psychological pressure, exhaustion, and fatigue, so through our article today we will try to clarify some matters related to the interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream. Read also: Pumpkin in a dream Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream There are many interpretations, but the majority of interpretations indicate For goodness, money, good condition, piety, piety for its owner and good deeds. Therefore, we find a number of points to simplify things for dreamers, including these. Seeing bread in a dream for another person is a sign of piety and piety and in the event that you see giving bread to another person is a sign. This is a sign of peace of mind or achieving profits and gains for the individual. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream for a young man. Interpretations of an unmarried young man who dreams of baked goods in the whole dream express the goodness and presence of the expected events for the dreamer, including bread in the dream, which is It is an indication of the piety and success that the dreamer has achieved in his professional life, or intercourse with a girl who has good morals, but if he eats a morsel of bread, this indicates that he is deceitful and hates others because he deceives them. Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream for a man. There are many interpretations to explain seeing bread in a person’s dream with a halal life. Or a good reputation, or that people treat him well, or profits from his trade or work, or success in his career. When you see a lot of bread in a man’s dream with others, this indicates the world’s love for him and his help for them. If it is white bread, this A sign of a peaceful life in which a man lives with his wife and the man enjoys a good life, comfort and luxury. When he sees bread in abundance, this indicates that the dreamer is enjoying good health, or recovering from a long illness. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream for a married womanWoman A married woman who sees bread in her dream is a good vision, which indicates how happy she is with her husband in her life, as well as her husband’s upcoming livelihood. Seeing a married woman offering bread to another person is a sign of the upcoming goodness and great generosity of her husband. In the event that the wife gives her husband bread after preparing it For her, this is evidence of the wife’s sincere love for her husband and that her married life is happy. And when he sees that he is giving bread to the children, it shows that he will have good children and good offspring. Or her children will enjoy success in school life and a bright future awaits them. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream for a woman Single Woman: Seeing bread in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that good is imminent for her, whether in her psychological state or in her relationship with marriage as a whole.

title: Interpretation of seeing Friday in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about Friday in a dream, and it is a blessed day, where Muslims gather for Friday prayers, where believers listen to the Friday sermon and perform the prayer, so Muslims often pray on Friday, because it is a time of response. Interpretation of dreams about Friday for single and divorced women It is a special day for Muslims and seeing Friday In a dream, dreams have many meanings and indicators, as we will learn today. The dream that caused you some kind of anxiety and confusion. Interpretation of dreams: seeing a day of the week in a dream and seeing Friday in a dream. First of all, we must agree that each day of the week has a different and unique meaning and a specific interpretation of seeing it in a dream, and nothing will happen to you except what God has written for you, and whoever sees that he is praying on Friday, then he will take a journey of forgiveness, in which he will receive... Money and food, what he wants and what he hopes for. Friday prayer in a dream is a sign of joy and happiness, attending holidays, seasons, Hajj, or meeting a lover, and fulfilling the need he requests. Friday is the best day on which the sun rises, as narrated by the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, and it is the best obligatory prayer for Muslims, and it is a time when the call is not answered. . Whoever dies on this day is immune from the ordeal of the grave. Whoever prays Fajr prayer will have achieved the best day of his week. Based on all of this, and apart from many of the virtues that we did not mention, Friday is one of the best days that Muslims witness, with some days whose blessings have been specified in... the talk. The Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, like Eid, the ten days of Hajj, and the days of Ramadan. Interpretation of a dream about Friday for pregnant and married women. Of course, we all agree that Friday is the best day on which the sun rises and the value of Friday is great, as our master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, said that Friday has great value and a great reward on Friday. It is as if it is a holiday for Muslims, in which God has set an hour in which if someone receives someone and supplicates him, God will answer his supplication. That is, on Friday, there is an hour in which the request will be answered. Just as the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said that from Friday to Friday is an atonement for the sins, transgressions, and deceptions that occur between them, and also Friday is considered A holiday for Muslims, and therefore the interpreters unanimously agreed that seeing Friday in a dream is good, good tidings, blessings, peace, and reassurance. Al-Azhar said about the interpretation of seeing Friday in a dream that Friday in a dream shows the proximity of reunion and comfort in the various matters of this worldly life and also That there is the coming of relief after hardships and also the arrival of blessings. In that person's life, as Azhar said, whoever sees Friday in his dream, it means that there is a problem or situation in that person's life that indicates that he is good, just like seeing Friday in a dream. And pleasure. As for whoever sees Friday prayers in a dream, this indicates the approaching marriage, and he hears the call to prayer, the takbeer, and the tashahhud, but he sits in his home or at his workplace and sees the end of the prayer. This indicates that there are matters behind this person that he has not completed, or that he will be removed from a position, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of Friday in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s article

And happiness. As for whoever sees Friday prayers in a dream, this indicates the approach of marriage, and he hears the call to prayer, takbir and testimony, but he sits in his house or in his workplace and sees the end of the prayer. This indicates that this person has unfinished business behind him, or that he will be dismissed from a position, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing Friday in a dream Ibn Sirin said:

title: Interpretation of a dream about shortness of breath and suffocation in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about shortness of breath and suffocation in a dream. God created many different systems for humans, and each system has its own function. There is the digestive system, the circulatory system, the nervous system, as well as the respiratory system, whose function is to control the breathing process, bring in oxygen, and remove carbon dioxide from the body. The person is exposed to certain diseases that make him unable to Breathing and sometimes requires the use of an oxygen device, as well as the psychological state and depression play an important role in the process of breathing and suffocation, so what is the interpretation of a dream about shortness of breath and suffocation in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about shortness of breath for a man Shortness of breath is one of the symptoms that affects the respiratory system and sometimes it is an accompanying disease, as the person needs to Special medications for treatment or breathing, and seeing it in a dream is a clear indication that the person has suffered from seizures or problems in his body. Life: A man lives in a vacuum of alienation and is among his family and his family when he sees in his dream that he is suffocating and has difficulty breathing. Likewise, a person finds difficulty in repaying his debts when he faces difficulty breathing and suffocates in his sleep. A person also commits many sins when he dreams that he He is suffocating and has difficulty breathing. In addition, the deceased needs constant benevolence from his soul when he sees that the deceased is having difficulty breathing. The man also faces difficulty communicating and dealing with others if he sees difficulty breathing in his dream. He also makes wrong decisions and affects It is negatively affected by him, when he sees that he is suffocating during his sleep, and has difficulty breathing. In addition, a man is robbed when he sees in his dream that he is having difficulty breathing and drowning. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a selfie in a dream by the most famous scholars of complete interpretationInterpretation of the dream of shortness of breath For individuals, the interpretation of this vision is due to the girl thinking about matters that limit her, and she may also suffer from this issue and occupy her thinking, and we will learn in detail the interpretation of this vision and its meaning in reality: An unmarried girl faces problems and difficulties in her emotional relationships, when she sees in her dream that they are narrow and suffocating. She also thinks negatively and makes bad decisions when she sees difficulty breathing during her sleep. She also has a desire to change her reality by changing her reality when she sees that she is suffocating in her sleep and struggling to breathe during her sleep. In addition, the single girl falls into a failed romantic relationship When she sees that she is having difficulty breathing during her sleep. She is also connected to a young man who causes her a lot of problems, if he sees that she is suffocating during her sleep and has difficulty breathing. The girl also feels inferior and lacks self-confidence when she dreams that she is breathing with difficulty and suffocation. The girl also feels sad for Her engagement and wedding are delayed when she sees that she is suffocating during her sleep and has difficulty breathing. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing cheating in an exam in a dream. Shortness of breath in a married woman. A woman endures many of the hardships and pressures that she faces in her life, and this appears in her dreams that she is suffocating from these

title: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing the death of a husband in a dream...longevity and sins!

preview.html: The death of a husband is one of the most difficult experiences that any wife can go through, so any woman who sees that her husband died in a dream feels anxious, especially if the husband is alive and the girl is unmarried or widowed. She is also surprised to see the death of the husband in a dream, so we will look for you at Everything that dream interpreters mentioned about the interpretation of this vision. Interpretation of a dream about a hospital in a dream - a symbol of seeing hospitals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the death of a husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the death of a husband in a dream could be a sign of the psychological exhaustion and psychological suffering that this woman feels. The woman in her life with her husband. The death of the husband in a married woman’s dream may be the result of the husband’s absence from his wife’s life as a result of the husband’s preoccupation with her. The death of the husband in a married woman’s dream may indicate a state of estrangement in feelings between this woman and the husband. If the husband is suffering from A serious illness. The death of the husband may be an indication that the husband has already died. Interpretation of a dream about the back in a dream - a symbol of seeing the back in a dream. Interpretation of the death of a husband in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that the death of the husband in a dream may be the result of this woman’s intense love for her husband and her fear Of actually losing this husband. The death of the husband may indicate the appearance of this man in some financial and economic crises and his exposure to debts in the next stage. The death of the husband may be the result of him falling into some sorrows, problems and worries at that time in his life. Interpretation of a dream about clouds in a dream for unmarried women - A symbol of seeing clouds and clouds in a dream. Interpretation of the death of a husband in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing the death of a husband who is still alive is one of the signs that indicate the long life of that husband, God willing. But if the widow finds that the death of her husband is repeated again in In a dream, this may be the result of her repeated thinking about this matter and the impact of this incident on her soul. The death of a husband in a dream for a married woman could be one of the signs that indicate worsening problems between the dreamer and her current husband, which may lead to separation through divorce. Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream - A symbol of seeing money in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the death of a husband in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that the death of a husband could be a sign of the death of the dreamer’s conscience and the commission of many sins, taboos and violations. In some dreams, the death of a husband is an indication of this husband’s betrayal of his wife. Her knowledge of this betrayal ends the marital relationship with him. If a married woman sees that the husband with whom she had problems died in a dream and she cried over him a lot, then this vision could be good news for this woman that she will get rid of these problems. Ibn Shaheen believes that the husband who commits Taboos, immorality, and the appearance of the death of a husband in a dream may indicate the good conditions of that person and his closeness to God Almighty and his abandonment of these sins and taboos.Interpretation of a dream of a wedding party in a dream - a symbol of seeing a wedding party in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the death of a husband in a dream by Ibn Kathir.Interpretation of seeing a parrot

title: Interpretation of a dream about bread

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dream about bread in a dream, according to many interpreters, is often good, and many commentators and interpreters have dealt with this vision, the most famous of whom is the author of the great interpretation of dreams, Ibn Sirin as well. Like Nabulsi, bread in a dream often indicates a happy life, abundant food, and neighborhood abundance. It may also indicate Islam or science, and it rarely indicates evil, unless it spoils the bread, because in most cases the commentators mentioned that it is not good. Interpretation of a vision Bread in a dreamCommentators mentioned that dreaming of eating fresh bread means a happy life. Also, beautiful bread in a dream indicates a beautiful woman, wealth, livelihood, or longevity. As for seeing rotten brown bread in a dream, it is evidence of the opposite of worry, sadness, and affliction. Also, seeing bread in a dream It can refer to Islam, science, and scholars. Whoever dreams of eating good bread, this indicates that his condition is good with his Lord or that God opens the doors of knowledge for him. The interpretation of the vision of the previous interpretations depends on the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of the dream of bread by Ibn Sirin. The famous commentator Muhammad ibn Sirin said: Whoever saw In his dream that he is eating bright bread, this indicates his long life. As for whoever dreams of eating a loaf of bread in a knowledgeable place, this may be evidence of his approaching death, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that whoever sees that he is eating bread in a dream at the dining table or something A young man, then he saw that he finished the loaf and then picked up the food, this indicates the interruption of his life, and God knows best. . And if he sees that he is eating thin bread, this indicates the nearness of death. If he sees that he is buying bread in a dream for free and without a price, this indicates a prosperous life, God willing. But if he sees that he is paying the price of the bread that he bought, then this indicates his need, or he is looking for A way to satisfy his need. Seeing a baker in a dream means an opponent, it may indicate a good king. And if he sees that he is a baker, this indicates an abundance of kindness, and an abundance of sustenance, or that it is better for one of them to earn a rich profit. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that if he sees the dead person taking If he receives bread from him, this indicates the corruption of his religion as a result of strife. It can also indicate the death of a relative as a sick person. If he sees that he receives bread from death, this indicates his ability to provide livelihood. And if he distributes bread to the poor, this is his knowledge that is spreading among people and can It shows the reward he receives from God. Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream in Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi narrates that whoever sees that someone has given him a piece of bread indicates the nearness of his time and may foretell loneliness and illness. If he sees that he has a lot of bread in front of him, but he does not eat it, this indicates a meeting With his loved ones he missed. And if he sees that he is eating a virgin or leftover food with bread, this indicates that he is eating wax with honey and goodness, God willing. But if he sees that he is working as a baker, this indicates that he is trying to benefit him, and that he earns what he bakes in his sleep. If the bread Warm and warm, this indicates hypocrisy or shady money. Al-Nabulsi narrated that if he sees black bread in his dream, this indicates a good life, security of his religion, and purity of his soul.

title: Interpretation of a dream about making sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great translators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about making sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The world of dreams is a strange and deep world and contains many endless interpretations in the world of reality. The world of dreams and visions is something that exists in this context. We attach the interpretation of the dream of making sweets in a dream to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of making sweets in a dream for married people. Many of us tend to eat sweets greedily, and some of us even find it creative in making them, decorating them, and presenting them in the best way, and chefs compete with each other in this regard. Interpretation of a dream about making sweets in a dream for a married woman: Making sweets in a dream. If a woman sees that she is making sweets and others are eating them and enjoying them, this is evidence of her good morals and love for people, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. If a married woman sees that she is making sweets for her family, children, and husband, This is evidence of moral and material stability. Making candy in a dream. If a married woman sees that she is giving candy to someone, this is evidence of her benefit from that person. If a woman sees candy in a dream, she will give birth to a new baby. If a woman eats a lot of sweets in a dream This is a sign of trouble for her in the future. Making candy in a dream. If a married woman eats candy slowly and slowly, this means stability and reassurance in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about making sweets for single people. Candy is one of the foods that people love. a lot. They may struggle to make and eat it and some describe it as their mood booster and source of happiness. In this context, we attach the interpretation of a dream about making sweets for single people: If a girl sees herself making sweets, this means that she will communicate with the person she wants. If the girl is still in her studies, then making sweets is evidence of excellence and high grades. A girl who is looking for a job, if she sees... In her dream that she is making sweets, this is a sign that she will get a job soon. Making sweets in a dream, if the girl who dreams is in a quarrel between her and her friends, it will soon go away and things will return to normal. If the unmarried woman who saw the dream is sick and she sees that she is making Sweets, it is good that she will recover soon. Seeing sweets in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her good reputation and good upbringing, and evidence of her abundant and extensive diet. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of an unmarried woman seeing sweets, this is evidence of good luck in her life. See also : Interpretation of dreams of seeing a dead person buying a house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Watching someone making candy in a dream. Dreams differ from one person to another. The nature of a person's life is reflected even in his dreams, as if they explain the course of his life and the crises or pleasures that he experiences. In this context, we attach the interpretation of seeing someone making sweets in a dream: Making sweets in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of making sweets in a dream, indicates that this person will assume prestigious positions and reach a high status. If one sees that he is making sweets in a dream, it indicates that this person will assume prominent positions and reach a high status.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating raw fish, the meaning of fish in a dream

preview.html: Fish, a vision for married couples, for a pregnant woman, fried, grilled, fishing for live fish, large and small. Whoever dreams that he is fishing in clean, pure water is better for him and his child, if it is food for the child, and if he is caught in salty water, the opposite is true. Whoever sees fish in a dream and knows their number, this indicates a woman, and if not He can, as the fish indicates wealth and goodness. Whoever sees in a dream that he is looking at a large fish at the bottom of the water, river, or pond, and he catches and eats as he pleases, this indicates that he will be affected by money and treasure. . And a lot of goodness. And whoever sees that he is fishing and taking fish out of the well, then he is like me. And if one sees himself fishing in a cloudy lake, then this dream is not beneficial and does not benefit him. And whoever dreams that he is catching only a big fish, then this is a sign of goodness and benevolence. It has been said: Whoever sees that he is catching fish A small one indicates the disappearance and loss of grace. The dream of the same person who catches a fish without a scale indicates deception in taking people’s money and cheating on it. It also indicates deception or complicating or facilitating his affairs. Any person dreams of catching a brown fish, and in reality the dreamer wants someone who shares his interest. Certain, this indicates reconciliation between partners. Whoever dreams in a dream that he looks at the bottom of the water and sees a dead fish, then the dream indicates that its owner will not fulfill his desire, or his desire will not be fulfilled. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a fish in his bed or sleeps, this indicates His illness if he is a fisherman, and whoever catches a fish in the water will also be sad. And whoever sees in his dream that he is eating salty fish indicates fatigue and anxiety, and the opposite has been said, and whoever sees fish in front of him and there are only four in front of him, he will marry four wives, and whoever sees more fish. Of the four, this indicates money and spoils. And whoever sees in his dream a fish in his bed while he is fishing in the depths of the sea, then the dreamer drowns. And whoever sees that he is looking at fried fish, this indicates an answer to his prayer. And whoever sees that he is in the market and has many fish in front of him, so he bought a fish, then this It indicates that he will buy a maid, and if the fish is in a place other than the market or unknown, and he bought a fish, he will get married. And whoever sees that he is eating a rotten, rotten fish, and leaves good food and fresh fish, this indicates that the dreamer will come to a forbidden woman, and leave the legal marriage. Whoever dreams that he asked for a fish or a whale and was unable to obtain them, the dream indicates that he will condemn the person and deny his money and his rights. And whoever sees that he is looking at the lake or sea, and finds in it a large whale opening its mouth in one direction, the dreamer will be imprisoned. Whoever dreams that the fish opens And he takes out a pearl or two, then he will earn money from his wife, or he will give birth to a son or twins from her, and they will be just and righteous. And whoever sees in a dream that a fish comes out of his mouth, then this dream indicates that he is talking about a woman whose honor it is impossible to fall, and that he is oppressing her with his injustice. If a person dreams in a dream that he is catching a fish from the ground or the ground, then this dream indicates that he is committing immorality and adultery. Interpretation of a dream about fish - YouTube

Whoever sees in his dream that there is a fish in his bed or sleeps, this indicates His illness if he is a fisherman, and whoever catches a fish in the water will also be sad. And whoever sees in his dream that he is eating salty fish indicates fatigue and anxiety, and the opposite has been said, and whoever sees fish in front of him and there are only four in front of him, he will marry four wives, and whoever sees more fish. Of the four, this indicates money and spoils. And whoever sees in his dream a fish in his bed while he is fishing in the depths of the sea, then the dreamer drowns. And whoever sees that he is looking at fried fish, this indicates an answer to his prayer. And whoever sees that he is in the market and has many fish in front of him, so he bought a fish, then this It indicates that he will buy a maid, and if the fish is in a place other than the market or unknown, and he bought a fish, he will get married. And whoever sees that he is eating a rotten, rotten fish, and leaves good food and fresh fish, this indicates that the dreamer will come to a forbidden woman, and leave the legal marriage. Whoever dreams that he asked for a fish or a whale and was unable to obtain them, the dream indicates that he will condemn the person and deny his money and his rights. And whoever sees that he is looking at the lake or sea, and finds in it a large whale opening its mouth in one direction, the dreamer will be imprisoned. Whoever dreams that the fish opens And he takes out a pearl or two, then he will earn money from his wife, or he will give birth to a son or twins from her, and they will be just and righteous. And whoever sees in a dream that a fish comes out of his mouth, then this dream indicates that he is talking about a woman whose honor it is impossible to fall, and that he is oppressing her with his injustice. If a person dreams in a dream that he is catching a fish from the ground or the ground, then this dream indicates that he is committing immorality and adultery.
